issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Follow the test steps located here https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Debugger+Test+Plan to set up debug test project
2. Run test 1013 until step 20

Expected result:
On iOS and rhino imported call shows "imported( x )"

Actual result:
On V8 imported call shows imported()
fields.summary: Android : Debugger - V8 when running basic breakpoint test, breakpoint shows import instead of import(x)
fields.environment:
Ti Studio version 1.0.7.201112152014
Ti Mob SDK version 1.8.0.1.v20111216124633
Windows XP
Emulator 2.2

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress or input.
